product_name: Mountain Hardwear Refueler X-Train Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Refueler X-Train Shorts help you charge through your workout with 4-way stretch and lightweight fabric. Stretch-woven polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and feels like a soft breeze over your skin. Fabric features a durable water repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off fabric. Side pockets shelter hands and an internal pocket stores a key. Mountain Hardwear Refueler X-Train Shorts for men offer an active fit. Reflectiive highlights; soft drawcord waist; UPF 30 sun protection.
